quote: I joined Design at UCI before I even officially started at UCI, and it was one of the best decisions I made. The community and collaboration have been a huge part of my growth, and the concepts and skills I’ve gained in UI/UX and design as a whole have been invaluable throughout my time here!
name: Krey Pillei

quote: Joining Design at UCI has been hands-down the best choice I made coming into my first year! Whether it was getting involved in Project Teams, Design-a-thon, or having the privilege to lead our Mentorship program, I have grown so much as a designer AND an individual by staying involved!! The community I have found is truly irreplaceable; you meet the kindest, most supportive people in DAUCI!
name: Kylie Nguyen

quote: I am leaving DAUCI with far more than I expected. Through Project Teams, the internship program, and workshops, I have grown both professionally and personally. Beyond the skills and confidence gained, I’ve met inspiring people who are now close friends. Joining DAUCI was truly one of the most meaningful decisions of my college career.
name: Reyna Phan
